Package controllers

Class AdministratorController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AdministratorController
public class AdministratorController extends Object
The AdministratorController class handles the core functionalities for the administrator, including managing staff, inventory, and appointments.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String hospitalID, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the password for the administrator.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the administrator.
      oldPassword - The current password.
      newPassword - The new password.
      Returns:
      True if the password was successfully changed, false otherwise.
